item.title: bulletin
item.description: Alright, I made my ‘alpha version’ site almost ready. Need to find a way to upload this to my gayhub now. Only… I want a better code block look, and a better domain name. I will try to figure those out later. UTC+13 00:35:23 / 18 Mar 2019 I will randomally write something short and mark the time below, like this one. So maybe this can be a way for me to do a quick reply to you.

item.title: hello
item.description: shon-bottle? Like a bottle in the sea, the information on this site is floating on the internet. It’s pretty intriguing to me that you are here. Because through this language this media, somehow we connected. It will be really a pleasure for me if you like something here. So, really nice to meet you here, you can call me shon, or you will find my other names somewhere. I am now in New Zealand on a working holiday.

item.title: shonScript
item.description: I wrote an AutoHotKey script for the booking system of the hostel I am working in. Sorry, it can be tedious and confusing for you to read these code here directly. I am not so sure about why I post this here either. If you like reading it, it’s down there. It can extract the booking information from the Outlook mail and the SiteMinder Channel Manager, then help to search and fill forms on the Backpack Online System.
